summary:
**Assassin's Creed Odyssey** is an action role-playing game released in 2018 by Ubisoft. It's the eleventh game in the Assassin's Creed series, set during the Peloponnesian War (431-422 BC) in Greece. Players control a Spartan mercenary, exploring a big open world, fighting, and sailing ships. The game focuses more on combat and exploration than stealth. It continues the story of Layla Hassan, introduced in *Origins*. Development started after *Syndicate*, aiming for more role-playing elements and player choices.

Critics liked the game's world, graphics, and characters but criticized its pacing and microtransactions. It sold over 10 million copies and had extra content added, like *Legacy of the First Blade* and *The Fate of Atlantis*. The next game, *Valhalla*, came out in 2020.
title: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
